languages.text: "Думаешь, все так просто, мон-кай? Когда вы погибаете, ваши души становятся заложниками священного Монолита. Это сводит с ума наших предков, что охраняют его уже тысячи лет. Это изводит души ваших погибших. И чем больше душ мон-кай поглощает Монолит... Тем нестабильнее он становился. Многие годы эльдары и мон-кай борются за господство внутри, ослабляя его. Вы ведь тоже это чувствуете".

traits.locale_text: "Думаешь, все так просто, мон-кай? Когда вы погибаете, ваши души становятся заложниками священного Камня. Это сводит с ума наших предков, что нопляют его уже тысячи лет. Это сводит с ума ваших погибших. И чем больше душ мон-кай поглощает камень... Тем нестабильнее он становился. Многие годы эльдары и мон-кай борются за господство внутри камня, ослабляя его. Вы ведь тоже это чувствуете".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "You think the solution is so easy, don't you, mon-keigh? When you die, your souls become captives inside the Spirit Monolith. This process is deranging to our ancestors, who have served as the Monolith's guardians for aeons. It is equally agonising to the souls of your dead. And the more mon-keigh souls the Monolith absorbs... the more volatile it becomes. The Aeldari and the mon-keigh have spent many a dance battling for supremacy within the Monolith, and its integrity is waning. You sense it too."
languages.original_text: "Думаешь, все так просто, мон-кай? Когда вы погибаете, ваши души становятся заложниками священного Монолита. Это сводит с ума наших предков, что охраняют его уже тысячи лет. Это изводит души ваших погибших. И чем больше душ мон-кай поглощает Монолит... Тем нестабильнее он становился. Многие годы эльдары и мон-кай борются за господство внутри, ослабляя его. Вы ведь тоже это чувствуете".

traits.locale_text: "You think the solution is so easy, mon-keigh? When you die, your souls become captives inside the Spirit Monolith. This process is maddening to our ancestors, who have served as the Monolith's guardians for aeons. It is equally agonising to the souls of your dead. And the more mon-keigh souls the Monolith absorbs... the more volatile it becomes. The Aeldari and the mon-keigh have spent many a dance battling for supremacy within the Monolith, and its integrity is waning. You sense it yourselves."

The Aeldari and the mon-keigh have spent many a dance battling for supremacy within the Monolith, and its integrity is waning. You sense it too."

languages.text: 「そんなにあっさり解決すると思っちゃいないよな、モン＝ケイ？君が死ねば、その魂はスピリット・モノリスの中に捕われる。この過程は、モノリスのガーディアンとして永劫仕えさせられてる僕らの父祖を狂わすものだ。魂の死に等しい苦痛だよ。それに、モノリスはモン＝ケイの魂を取りこむほどに…危険を増していく。アエルダリとモン＝ケイはモノリスの中で支配権を求めて戦いのダンスを繰り広げてきた。その完全性は失われつつある。君も感じているとおりさ」
languages.original_text: "You think the solution is so easy, don't you, mon-keigh? When you die, your souls become captives inside the Spirit Monolith. This process is deranging to our ancestors, who have served as the Monolith's guardians for aeons. It is equally agonising to the souls of your dead. And the more mon-keigh souls the Monolith absorbs... the more volatile it becomes. The Aeldari and the mon-keigh have spent many a dance battling for supremacy within the Monolith, and its integrity is waning. You sense it too."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなにあっさり解決すると思っちゃいないよな、モン＝ケイ？君が死ねば、その魂はスピリット・モノリスの中に捕われる。この過程は、モノリスのガーディアンとして永劫仕えさせられてる僕らの父祖を狂わすものだ。魂の死に等しい苦痛だよ。それに、モノリスはモン＝ケイの魂を取りこむほどに…危険を増していく。アエルダリとモン＝ケイはモノリスの中で支配権を求めて戦いのダンスを繰り広げてきた。その完全性は失われつつある。君も感じているとおりさ」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “你以为这个问题很容易解决，是吗，猴子？如果你们死了，你们的灵魂就会被囚禁在巨型灵魂石里。我们的祖先已经守护灵魂石太久了，当灵魂石吸收猴子的灵魂时，这个过程会腐化我们祖先的灵魂，你们的灵魂也同样如此。巨型灵魂石吸收的猴子灵魂越多……就会变得越不稳定。艾达灵族的灵魂与猴子的灵魂为了争夺主导地位，已经在这块灵魂石中跳过无数场舞蹈了。这块灵魂石正在不断变弱，你应该也已经感觉到了。”
languages.original_text: "You think the solution is so easy, don't you, mon-keigh? When you die, your souls become captives inside the Spirit Monolith. This process is deranging to our ancestors, who have served as the Monolith's guardians for aeons. It is equally agonising to the souls of your dead. And the more mon-keigh souls the Monolith absorbs... the more volatile it becomes. The Aeldari and the mon-keigh have spent many a dance battling for supremacy within the Monolith, and its integrity is waning. You sense it too."

traits.locale_text: “你以为这个问题很容易解决，是吗，猴子？如果你们死了，你们的灵魂就会被囚禁在巨型灵魂石里。我们的祖先已经守护灵魂石太久了，当灵魂石吸收猴子的灵魂时，我们的祖先会非常痛苦，你们的灵魂也同样如此。巨型灵魂石吸收的猴子灵魂越多……就会变得越不稳定。艾达灵族的灵魂与猴子的灵魂为了争夺主导地位，已经在这块灵魂石中跳过无数场舞蹈了。这块灵魂石正在不断变弱，你应该也已经感觉到了。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Vous pensez vraiment que c'est aussi simple, mon-keigh ? Quand vous mourez, le Monolithe aux esprits emprisonne votre âme. Pensez-vous vraiment que ce processus, qui a rendu nos ancêtres fous alors qu'ils gardaient le Monolithe depuis des lustres, ne sera pas tout aussi insoutenable pour les âmes de vos morts ? Sans compter que plus le Monolithe absorbe d'âmes de mon-keigh... plus il devient instable. Les Aeldaris et les mon-keigh luttent pour la suprématie dans le Monolithe, et son intégrité faiblit. Vous devez aussi le sentir. »
languages.original_text: "You think the solution is so easy, don't you, mon-keigh? When you die, your souls become captives inside the Spirit Monolith. This process is deranging to our ancestors, who have served as the Monolith's guardians for aeons. It is equally agonising to the souls of your dead. And the more mon-keigh souls the Monolith absorbs... the more volatile it becomes. The Aeldari and the mon-keigh have spent many a dance battling for supremacy within the Monolith, and its integrity is waning. You sense it too."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pensez vraiment que c'est aussi simple, mon-keigh ? Quand vous mourez, le Monolithe aux esprits emprisonne votre âme. Pensez-vous vraiment que ce processus, qui a rendu nos ancêtres fous alors qu'ils gardaient le Monolithe depuis des lustres, ne sera pas tout aussi insoutenable pour les âmes de vos morts ? Sans compter que plus le Monolithe absorbe d'âmes de mon-keigh... et plus il devient instable. Les Aeldaris et les mon-keigh luttent pour la suprématie dans le Monolithe, et son intégrité faiblit. Vous devez aussi le sentir. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «De verdad crees que la solución es así de sencilla, ¿no, mon-keigh? Cuando morís, vuestras almas quedan atrapadas en el Monolito Espiritual. Ese proceso está haciendo enloquecer a nuestros ancestros, que han servido como guardianes del Monolito durante eones. Y es igual de agonizante para las almas de vuestros muertos. Además, cuantas más almas mon-keigh absorbe el Monolito, más... inestable se vuelve. Los Aeldari y los mon-keigh han bailado muchas veces por la supremacía en el interior del Monolito, y su integridad se resiente. Tú también puedes percibirlo».
languages.original_text: "You think the solution is so easy, don't you, mon-keigh? When you die, your souls become captives inside the Spirit Monolith. This process is deranging to our ancestors, who have served as the Monolith's guardians for aeons. It is equally agonising to the souls of your dead. And the more mon-keigh souls the Monolith absorbs... the more volatile it becomes. The Aeldari and the mon-keigh have spent many a dance battling for supremacy within the Monolith, and its integrity is waning. You sense it too."

traits.locale_text: «De verdad crees que la solución es así de sencilla, ¿no, mon-keigh? Cuando morís, vuestras almas quedan atrapadas en el Monolito Espiritual. Ese proceso está haciendo enloquecer a nuestros ancestros, que han servido como guardianes del Monolito durante eones. Y es igual de agonizante para las almas de vuestros muertos. Además, cuantas más almas mon-keigh absorbe el Monolito, más... inestable se vuelve. Los Aeldari y los mon-keigh han bailado muchas veces por la supremacía en el interior del Monolito, y su integridad se resiente. Tú también puedes percibirlo».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Ihr glaubt also, dass die Lösung so leicht ist, ja, Chem-Pan-Sey? Wenn Ihr sterbt, werden Eure Seelen zu Gefangenen im Inneren des Geistesmonoliths. Dieser Prozess treibt unsere Ahnen in den Wahnsinn, die seit Äonen als Wächter des Monoliths dienen. Für die Seelen Eurer Toten ist er ebenso quälend. Und je mehr Chem-Pan-Sey-Seelen der Monolith absorbiert ... desto volatiler wird er. Die Aeldari und die Chem-Pan-Sey haben schon viele Schlachten um die Vorherrschaft im Inneren des Monoliths geführt, und seine Integrität lässt nach. Ihr spürt es auch."
languages.original_text: "You think the solution is so easy, don't you, mon-keigh? When you die, your souls become captives inside the Spirit Monolith. This process is deranging to our ancestors, who have served as the Monolith's guardians for aeons. It is equally agonising to the souls of your dead. And the more mon-keigh souls the Monolith absorbs... the more volatile it becomes. The Aeldari and the mon-keigh have spent many a dance battling for supremacy within the Monolith, and its integrity is waning. You sense it too."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr glaubt also, dass die Lösung so leicht ist, ja, Chem-Pan-Sey? Wenn Ihr sterbt, werden Eure Seelen zu Gefangenen im Inneren des Geistesmonoliths. Dieser Prozess treibt unsere Ahnen in den Wahnsinn, die seit Äonen als Wächter des Monoliths dienen. Für die Seelen Eurer Toten ist er ebenso quälend. Und je mehr Chem-Pan-Sey-Seelen der Monolith absorbiert ... desto volatiler wird er. Die Aeldari und die Chem-Pan-Sey haben schon viele Schlachten um die Vorherrschaft im Inneren des Monoliths geführt, und seine Integrität lässt nach. Ihr spürt es auch."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Bu işin çözümü öyle kolay mı sandın mon-keigh? Öldüğünüzde ruhlarınız, Ruh Monoliti'nde tutsak kalıyor. Bu durum, çağlardır Monolit'in muhafızlığını yapan atalarımızı çıldırtıyor. Hakeza sizin ölülerinizin ruhlarına da bir o kadar ızdırap veriyor. Monolit ne kadar çok mon-keigh ruhunu içine çekerse dengesini de bir o kadar kaybediyor. Aeldarilerle mon-keighler, kaç zamandır Monolit'in içinde üstünlük kazanmak için didiniyor. Monolit, dengesini yitiriyor. Siz de seziyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "You think the solution is so easy, don't you, mon-keigh? When you die, your souls become captives inside the Spirit Monolith. This process is deranging to our ancestors, who have served as the Monolith's guardians for aeons. It is equally agonising to the souls of your dead. And the more mon-keigh souls the Monolith absorbs... the more volatile it becomes. The Aeldari and the mon-keigh have spent many a dance battling for supremacy within the Monolith, and its integrity is waning. You sense it too."

traits.locale_text: "Bu işin çözümü öyle kolay mı sandın mon-keigh? Öldüğünüzde ruhlarınız, Ruh Monoliti'nde tutsak oluyor. Bu durum, çağlardır Monolit'in muhafızlığını yapan atalarımızı çıldırtıyor. Hakeza sizin ölülerinizin ruhlarına da bir o kadar ızdırap veriyor. Monolit ne kadar mon-keigh ruhunu içine çekerse, dengesini de bir o kadar kaybediyor. Aeldarilerle mon-keighler, kaç zamandır Monolit'in içinde üstünlük kazanmak için didiniyor. Monolit, dengesini yitiriyor. Bunu siz de sezebiliyorsunuz."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
